channel.title: Infiltration in Bowser's Castle | Official Class Cards + Changes Thread
channel.description:
## Classcards: ### :mushroom: = Unique ### :shield: = Convert Immune
### [color=lime]Conquerors[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=navy]Alarm Bob-omb[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Killing[/color] > **Over Here? (Day)** - Force targeted player to target you tonight, if you redirect a killer into you, you will both die. The killing ability will be disabled for 1 night if the player is immune to your attack. - Infinite uses. > **Short Fuse (Night)** - Kill targeted player, you will both die. - 1 use > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=mediumorchid]Cackletta[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Special[/color] > **Bat Clones (Passive)** - You will not appear to be visiting your targets. Additionally, you will appear as a Minion to investigators until Day 4. > **Beanstar's Force (Passive)** - You are night and occupy immune, you will appear to not be occupy immune to occupiers though. > **Chuckola Cola (Day)** - Occupy target player. - 3 uses > **Dark Star (Day)** - Turn yourself into Midbus tonight - 1 use (Can only be used if only living Conqueror) > **Transfer Mind (Night)** - Convert targeted player to become a Conqueror - 2 uses (shared with Fawful's Brainwash). > **Belch Worm (Night)** - Make a player enraged tonight, making them kill all their visitors. - 1 use > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> Credit to @Simon for Chuckola Cola > Credit to @Shurian the Durian for Belch Worm.
> ## [color=black]Chain Chawful[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Offensive[/color] > **Woof Woof (Passive)** - Occupy and redirect immune. > **Intimidate (Night)** - Targeted player will be unable to leave the room tonight, occupying them - Infinite uses > **Watch (Night)** - Occupy any player trying to visit you, chipping through occupy immunity. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=lightgrey]Dry Bawfuls[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Social[/color] >**Bag of Bones (Passive)** - After you die, you aren’t truly dead. While dead, you can send ONE message per day in the thread. This message can only contain a “/Vote Player”. You don’t count towards majority. Once you have voted, you cannot change your vote that day. >**Calcium (Passive)** - You will appear to be your minion counterpart when you die. >**Rattle (Night)** - Force a player to target you. If you are killed by the person you target this with, they will be unable to vote the following day. - 3 uses. > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> **Credit to @Marluxion**
> ## [color=lightblue]Fawboo[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Social[/color] > **Undead (Passive)** - You can speak to the dead > **Haunt (Night)** - Target a player, you and them may send one 1000 character message to each other. - Infinite uses > **Spook (Night)** - Scare two players, causing them to target each other tonight. - 2 Uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=green]Faw Bro[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Killing[/color] > **Reforge (Day)** - Give a player a hammer, allowing them to kill a player of their choice at night. - 2 uses > **Hammer Toss (Night)** - Kill targeted player - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=orange]Fawbug[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Investigative[/color] > **Bandybug (Passive)** - Your visits do not show to other players. > **Hang (Night)** - Hang on the ceiling of someone's room. You will see who the visits them. - Infinite uses > **Jamboree (Night)** - See targeted player's faction. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=#e0e0e0]Fawfitu[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Investigative[/color] > **Spy-ny(Night)** - Targeted player cannot use killing abilities. - Infinite uses > **Fishing Rod (Night)** - Steal a dead player's ability and use it for the night. You cannot utilise abilities of Killer or Special classes. - 1 use > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> Credit to @techwolves for Fishing Rod.
> ## [color=lime]Fawful[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Special[/color] > **I HAVE FURY (Passive)** - If you are executed, you will reveal the class of the first person who accused you. > **Dark Star (Day)** - Turn yourself into Midbus tonight - 1 use (Can only be used if only living Conqueror) > **Brainwash (Night)** - Convert targeted player to become a Conqueror - 2 uses (shared with Cackletta's Transfer Mind). > **Fink Rats (Night)** - See target player's exact class if they are a Minion - 2 uses. > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> Credit to @Simon for Dark Star
> ## [color=blue]Faw. I[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Investigative[/color] > **Gaze (Night)** - Get 2 classtypes, one that the player is and one that the player is not. Pairings are Killer/Offensive, Support/Social and Investigative/Special - Infinite uses > **Stare (Night)** - Determine what a player's exact classtype is - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=green]Foofa Troopa[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Social[/color] > **Troop Talk (Passive)** - You can talk with any other Koopa Troopas in the game at night. > **Shell Megaphone (Night)** - Send a message in the morning. - 4 uses > **Negative (Night)** - Negate the votes of a player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=saddlebrown]Foomba[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Support[/color] > **Spike Top (Day)** - You will be death immune tonight. - 2 uses > **I don't have a nose. (Passive)** - You are immune to flatulence. > **Knowledge of Stomping (Night)** - Heal target player from attacks or fire. - Infinite uses > **Lift Foot (Night)** - Heal yourself tonight from attacks or fire - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=lime]Magifoofa[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Support[/color] > **Transformation Magic (Night)** - Give target a curse depending on the target's type. Will give additional feedback if it actually helps the player. - 4 uses > **Killer** - Any death immunity will be removed tonight. > **Offensive** - Player will be prevented from occupying their target if their target is a Conqueror. > **Support** - Target player will be occupied. > **Social** - Target will be framed. > **Investigative** - Target's investigative abilities will show false results. (Does not go through Scuttle/Cackletta's invisible visits) > **Special** - Target's abilities will be guaranteed to work. > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=hotpink]Midbus[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Killing[/color] > **Unhealthy Food (Day)** - Occupy targeted player tonight. - Infinite uses > **Spicy Food (Day)** - Target player will be set on fire and die in 2 nights unless healed. - 2 uses > **Come on and Slam (Night)** - Kill target player - Infinite uses > **Pig Fat (Night)** - Prevent all visitors from visiting target Conqueror - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=red]Parafoofa[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Support[/color] > **Safety (Day)** - Make targeted player immune to occupation and redirection - Infinite uses >**Me (Night)** - Carry yourself to safety, you will be notified if anything bad were to happen to you. This will also save you from death. - 3 uses >**Float Away (Night)** - Players targeting one of the players will be redirected to the other target. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=red]Piranhaful[/color] :mushroom: > [color=lime]Conqueror Killing[/color] > **Venus Fire Trap (Day)** - Target player will be set on fire and die in 2 nights unless healed. - 2 uses > **Pipes Outside (Night)** - Stay in your pipes, you will be unable to be visited by other players. You will be notified if an attacker tries to attack you and you will kill them. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Conquer the castle. Peach's is next, after that. The WORLD.*
> ## [color=darkblue]Sniffle Thwomp[/color] > [color=lime]Conqueror Support[/color] > **Float (Night)** - Float over the door of target player, if you see an attacker, you will kill them - Infinite uses > **UGH! (Night)** - Prevent visits to target player - 2 uses (can target self) > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
[/details]
### [color=red]Infiltrators[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=green]Luigi[/color] :mushroom: > [color=red]Infiltrator Killing[/color] > **Poltergust 5000 (Day)** - Find out your target's logs and class - 2 uses > **Thunderbrand (Night)** - Kill your targeted player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=red]Mario[/color] :mushroom: > [color=red]Infiltrator Special[/color] > **Lay off the Spaghetti (Passive)** - You will appear as a Minion to Investigative abilities. > **Pass the Hat (Passive)** - If you die, another infiltrator will become Mario. > **Metal Cap (Day)** - Make yourself night immune tonight. - 3 uses (shared) > **Firebrand (Day)** - Burn your target player, they will die in 2 nights unless healed - 4 uses (shared) > **Fire Flower (Night)** - Freeze target player to death. - Infinite uses (can only use if there is no Luigi) > **Cappy Possession (Night)** - Convert someone to the Infiltrator side, can only use if you are there aren't 3 living Infiltrators, you will lose your Lay off the Spaghetti passive if you use this - 1 use (shared) > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=navy]Possessed Bob-omb[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Killing[/color] > **Over Here? (Day)** - Force targeted player to target you tonight, if you redirect a killer into you, you will both die. The killing ability will be disabled for 1 night if the player is immune to your attack. - Infinite uses. > **Non Suicidal Explosions (Night)** - Kill targeted player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=lightblue]Possessed Boo[/color] :mushroom: > [color=red]Infiltrator Social[/color] > **Undead (Passive)** - You can speak to the dead. Additionally, dead Infiltrators may talk with the living Infiltrators as long as you are living. > **Haunt (Night)** - Target a player, you and them may send one 1000 character message to each other. - Infinite uses > **Spook (Night)** - Scare two players, causing them to target each other tonight. - 2 Uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=black]Possessed Chain Chomp[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Offensive[/color] > **Woof Woof (Passive)** - Occupy and redirect immune. > **Borf (Day)** - Targeted player will be unable to use day abilities. (Does not notify them that it didn't work unless it happens immediately or affects the night (example: Clown Car)) - 2 uses > **Intimidate (Night)** - Targeted player will be unable to leave the room tonight occupying them, bypassing occupy immunity. - Infinite uses > **Watch (Night)** - Occupy any player trying to visit you, chipping through occupy immunity. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=lightgrey]Possessed Dry Bones[/color] :mushroom: > [color=red]Infiltrator Social[/color] >**Bag of Bones (Passive)** - After you die, you aren’t truly dead. While dead, you can send ONE message per day in the thread. This message can only contain a “/Vote Player”. You don’t count towards majority. Once you have voted, you cannot change your vote that day. > **Calcium (Passive)** - You will appear to be your minion counterpart when you die. > **Tattered Bones (Day)** - If target player dies tonight, they will appear as the class specified. - 3 uses1 > **Boneslip (Night)** - Targeted player will appear to be an Infiltrator on death. - Infinite uses >**Rattle (Night)** - Force a player to target you. If you are killed by the person you target this with, they will be unable to vote the following day. - 3 uses. > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=saddlebrown]Possessed Goomba[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Social[/color] > **I don't have a nose. (Passive)** - You are immune to flatulence. > **Spike Top (Day)** - You will be death immune tonight. - 2 uses > **Pyromania (Day)** - Target player will believe they were set on fire, and will be healed tonight. - 2 uses > **Knowledge of Stomping (Night)** - If specified infiltrator is attacked, flatulenced or on fire, heal them. - Infinite uses > **Lift Foot (Night)** - Heal yourself tonight from attacks or fire - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=green]Possessed Hammer Bro[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Killing[/color] > **Reforge (Day)** - Give a player a counterfeit hammer, if they use it. They will die. - 2 uses > **Hammer Toss (Night)** - Kill targeted player. - Infinite uses > **Accurate Hammer (Night)** - Kill targeted player, bypassing everything that could stop you. - 1 use > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=green]Possessed Koopa Troopa[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Social[/color] > **Troop Talk (Passive)** - You can talk with any other Koopa Troopas in the game at night. > **Shell Kick (Day)** - Player's night results will be warped - Infinite uses > **Shell Megaphone (Night)** - Send a message in the morning. - 4 uses > **Negative (Night)** - Negate the votes of a player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=#e0e0e0]Possessed Lakitu[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Offensive[/color] > **Spy-ny (Night)** - Spiny spies will determine the player's exact class type and will occupy them. - Infinite uses > **Fishing Rod (Night)** - Steal a dead player's ability and use it for the night. You cannot utilise the abilities of Killer or Special classes. - 3 uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=lime]Possessed Magikoopa[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Support[/color] > **Self Targeted Magic (Night)** - Give yourself a boost depending on targeted player's classtype. You will not know what you boosted yourself with if it prevents something. - 2 uses > **Killer/Support** - You will be death immune. > **Offensive/Social** - Visitors will be prevented from visiting you. > **Investigative/Special** - People targeting you will be redirected to a random Non Infiltrator player. > > **Transformation Magic (Night)** - Give target a boost or downgrade depending on the target's type. - 4 uses > **Killer** - Target's kill will guarantee to work. If a not an ally, any protection will be removed tonight. > **Offensive** - Target will bypass occupy/redirect immunity if they are an ally, If a not an ally, target will be prevented from visiting their target. > **Support** - Target will be occupation immune, if a Minion, their protective abilities will not work. > **Social** - Allies will appear as a Minion to investigations tonight, non allies will be framed. > **Investigative** - If not allied, target's investigative abilities will show false results. (Does not go through Scuttle's invisible visits) > **Special** - Target's abilities will be guaranteed to work. > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=blue]Possessed Mr. I[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Investigative[/color] > **Gaze (Night)** - If targeted player is a minion, see their exact class. - Infinite uses > **X-ray Stare (Night)** - See targeted player's logs if they have any. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=red]Possessed Paratroopa[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Support[/color] > **Safety (Day)** - All Infiltrators will appear as minions to investigations tonight. - 1 use >**Shell Swap (Night)** - Players targeting one target will be redirected to the other target. - Infinite uses >**Us (Night)** - Carry targeted Infiltrator to safety, preventing visits to them. - 3 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=red]Possessed Piranha Plant[/color] :mushroom: > [color=red]Infiltrator Killing[/color] > **Venus Fire Trap (Day)** - Target player will be set on fire and die in 2 nights unless healed. - 2 uses > **Pipe Ambush (Night)** - Kill targeted player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=orange]Possessed Scuttlebug[/color] > [color=green]Minion Investigative[/color] > **Bandybug (Passive)** - Your visits do not show to other players. > **Hang (Night)** - Hang on the ceiling of someone's room. You will see who they target and who visits them. - Infinite uses > **Jamboree (Night)** - See two targeted player's exact classes. - 1 use > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=darkblue]Possessed Thwomp[/color] > [color=green]Minion Support[/color] > **UGH! (Night)** - Prevent visits to target player - 4 uses > **Crush (Night)** - Targeted player will die tonight, bypassing everything. - 1 use > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=#e0e0e0]Toad[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Support[/color] > **1-UP Mushroom (Night)** - If specified infiltrator is attacked, heal them. - Infinite uses > **BUP (Night)** - Make all infiltrators appear as a Minion to investigative checks tonight. - 1 use > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.*
> ## [color=lime]Yoshi[/color] > [color=red]Infiltrator Offensive[/color] > **Tax Fraud (Passive)** - Occupy and redirect immune > **Egg (Night)** - Occupy target player - Infinite uses > **Yoshi Ride (Night)** - Select 2 targets, players targeting one will target the other - 3 uses > *Your goal is to Infiltrate the Castle and rescue the Princess.* [/details]
### [color=green]Minions[/color] [details=Show]
> ## [color=navy]Bob-omb[/color] > [color=green]Minion Killing[/color] > **Over Here? (Day)** - Force targeted player to target you tonight, if you redirect a killer into you, you will kill them. The killing ability will be disabled for 1 night if the player is immune to your attack. - Infinite uses. > **Short Fuse (Night)** - Kill targeted player, you will both die. - 1 use (cannot be used until Night 3) > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Bob-omb**[/color] or [color=lime]**Alarm Bob-omb**[/color]
> ## [color=lightblue]Boo[/color] :mushroom: > [color=green]Minion Social[/color] > **Undead (Passive)** - You can speak to the dead > **Haunt (Night)** - Target a player, you and them may send one 1000 character message to each other. - Infinite uses > **Spook (Night)** - Scare two players, causing them to target each other tonight. - 2 Uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Boo**[/color] or [color=lime]**Fawboo**[/color]
> ## [color=green]Bowser Jr[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=green]Minion Killing[/color] > **Son of the Koopa King (Passive)** - Occupy and redirect immune > **Clown Car (Day)** - Keep a player in your clown car tonight, they will be able to message you throughout the night and you can message them. The player you use this ability in will be unable to be visited - Infinite uses > **Cannonball (Night)** - Blast that player in your clown car to space, killing them. - 3 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Convert Immune
> ## [color=black]Chain Chomp[/color] > [color=green]Minion Offensive[/color] > **Woof Woof (Passive)** - Occupy and redirect immune. > **Intimidate (Night)** - Targeted player will be unable to leave the room tonight, occupying them - Infinite uses > **Watch (Night)** - Occupy any player trying to visit you, chipping through occupy immunity. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Chain Chomp**[/color] or [color=lime]**Chain Chawful**[/color]
> ## [color=lightgrey]Dry Bones[/color] :mushroom: > [color=green]Minion Social[/color] >**Bag of Bones (Passive)** - After you die, you aren’t truly dead. While dead, you can send ONE message per day in the thread. This message can only contain a “/Vote Player”. You don’t count towards majority. Once you have voted, you cannot change your vote that day. >**Rattle (Night)** - Force a player to target you. If you are killed by the person you target this with, they will be unable to vote the following day. - 3 uses. *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Dry Bones**[/color] or [color=lime]**Dry Bawfuls**[/color]
> **Credit to @Marluxion**
> ## [color=saddlebrown]Goomba[/color] > [color=green]Minion Support[/color] > **I don't have a nose. (Passive)** - You are immune to flatulence. > **Spike Top (Day)** - You will be death immune tonight. - 2 uses > **Knowledge of Stomping (Night)** - Heal target player from attacks, flatulence or fire. - Infinite uses > **Lift Foot (Night)** - Heal yourself tonight from attacks or fire - 2 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Goomba**[/color] or [color=lime]**Foomba**[/color]
> ## [color=green]Hammer Bro[/color] > [color=green]Minion Killing[/color] > **Reforge (Day)** - Give a player a hammer, allowing them to kill a player of their choice at night, if used by a player that is not a Minion, they will instead be occupied tonight. (You will not know what happened) - 2 uses > **Hammer Toss (Night)** - Kill targeted player, if they are a minion. You will die instead - Infinite uses (cannot use until Night 3) > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Converts into [color=red]**Possessed Hammer Bro**[/color] or [color=lime]**Faw Bro**[/color]
> ## [color=green]Koopa Troopa[/color] > [color=green]Minion Social[/color] > **Troop Talk (Passive)** - You can talk with any other Koopa Troopas in the game at night. > **Shell Megaphone (Night)** - Send a message in the morning. - 4 uses > **Negative (Night)** - Negate the votes of a player. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=#e0e0e0]Lakitu[/color] > [color=green]Minion Investigative[/color] > **Spy-ny(Night)** - See if targeted player attacked someone. Only detects attacks where visits show. - Infinite uses > **Fishing Rod (Night)** - Steal a dead player's ability and use it for the night. You cannot utilise abilities of Killer or Special classes. - 1 use > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> Credit to @techwolves for Fishing Rod.
> ## [color=steblue]Magikoopa[/color] > [color=green]Minion Support[/color] > **Self Targeted Magic (Night)** - Give yourself a boost depending on targeted player's classtype. You will not know what you boosted yourself with if it prevents something. - 2 uses > **Killer/Support** - You will be death immune. > **Offensive/Social** - You will be occupy immune. > **Investigative/Special** - You will be convert immune. > **Transformation Magic (Night)** - Give target a boost depending on the target's type. Will give additional feedback if it actually helps the player. - Infinite uses > **Killer** - Target will be death immune. > **Offensive** - Target will bypass occupy immunity > **Support** - Target will be occupation immune. > **Social** - Target will be convert immune. > **Investigative** - Target's investigative abilities will show correct results no matter what. (Does not go through Mario's passive or Scuttle/Cackletta's invisible visits) > **Special** - Nothing. > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=blue]Mr. I[/color] > [color=green]Minion Investigative[/color] > **Gaze (Night)** - Get 2 classtypes, one that the player is and one that the player is not. Pairings are Killer/Offensive, Support/Social and Investigative/Special > **Stare (Night)** - Determine if a player is an Infiltrator or not - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=red]Paratroopa[/color] > [color=green]Minion Support[/color] > **Safety (Day)** - Target player will be immune to conversion. - 2 uses >**Me (Night)** - Carry yourself to safety. This will also save you from death. - 3 uses >**Float Away (Night)** - Players targeting one of the players will be redirected to the other target. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=red]Piranha Plant[/color] :mushroom: > [color=green]Minion Killing[/color] > **Venus Fire Trap (Day)** - Target player will be set on fire and die in 2 nights unless healed. - 2 uses > **Pipes Outside (Night)** - Stay in your pipes, you will be unable to be visited by other players. You will be notified if an attacker tries to attack you and you will kill them. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=orange]Scuttlebug[/color] > [color=green]Minion Investigative[/color] > **Bandybug (Passive)** - Your visits do not show to other players. > **Hang (Night)** - Hang on the ceiling of someone's room. You will see who the visits them. - Infinite uses > **Jamboree (Night)** - See targeted player's faction. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.*
> ## [color=darkblue]Thwomp[/color] > [color=green]Minion Support[/color] > **Float (Night)** - Float over the door of target player, if you see an attacker, you will kill them - Infinite uses > **UGH! (Night)** - Prevent visits to target player - 2 uses (can target self) > *Your goal is to stop anyone who plans on taking the princess or the castle.* [/details]
### [color=grey]Neutrals[/color] [details=Show] > ## [color=blue]Count Bleck[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Social[/color] > **Driven (Passive)** - You are occupy and night immune. > **Curse of the Chaos Heart (Passive)** - If you win or both of your targets are dead. Your abilities will be disabled. > **Black Magic (Night)** - Frame one of your targets making them appear as an Infiltrator tonight. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to get one of your targets executed. Your targets are [X] and [Y]*
> ## [color=saddlebrown]Kong[/color] :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Support[/color] > **This Tie has Style (Passive)** - Your tie makes you immune to flatulence and fire. > **Expansion (Day)** - Make yourself night immune tonight - 3 uses > **Banana (Night)** - Heal target player from attacks, flatulence or fire. - Infinite uses > **Banana Slamma (Night)** - Kill target player - 2 uses > *Your goal is to survive*
> ## [color=grey]Professor E. Gadd[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Investigative[/color] >**Scientific Armor (Passive)** - Immune to death at night once. >**Spooky Trio (Passive)** - When you spawn into the game, three ghosts will begin roaming the castle at night. At the start of each day, you will be notified of the amount of ghosts you have collected, and the amount of ghosts still roaming the halls of the castle. While a ghost is in a players' room, investigation results on that player will be warped. >**Strobulb (Night)** - Investigate if there is a ghost in the player’s room. - Infinite uses >**Poltergust 7000 (Night)** - Capture the ghosts in the player’s room, occupying them. If they vote the next day, they will die. - 4 uses > *Your goal is to capture all the ghosts in the castle. There are 3 ghosts in the castle (Boo does not count somehow..)*
> Credit to @Whammerist for the rework.
> ## [color=Mediumspringgreen]Rosalina[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Support[/color] >**Starstruck (Passive)** - You are immune to death, but If all of your targets die you will leave the mushroom kingdom that night. (Die.) >**Luma Shield (Night)** - Send your Luma to protect one of your targets. Players will be prevented from visiting them. Each player can only be Luma shielded twice per game. - 6 uses > You must keep at least one of [playerA] , [playerB] and [playerC] alive until the end of the game.
> **Credit to @Marluxion**
> ## [color=Slateblue]Shadow Mario[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Offensive[/color] > Disguise (Passive) - Immune to Occupation. Immune to death once. Paint (Day) - Cover a target’s room with paint, occupying them tonight. - Unlimited Uses Yoink! (Night) - Target a player. Tonight, if they use a night ability, you will steal it from them. You keep this ability as an extra ability. The player will be unable to use the stolen ability while you are alive. - 3 uses *Your objective is to cover all living player’s rooms with paint.*
> **Credit to @Marluxion**
> ## [color=purple]Waluigi[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color] >**Wah (Passive)** - You are night immune, occupy and redirect immune. >**Waah (Day)** - Your Noodle String ability will bypass night immunity tonight - 3 uses >**Walurambo (Day)** - Edit a player’s logs and class that show up on their death - 3 uses >**Noodle String (Night)** - Force a player to kill another. - Infinite uses >**Wah Are You (Night)** - Determine a player's class. - 3 uses > *Your goal is to kill the Infiltrators and the Minions to gain all the riches in the castle to yourself.*
> ## [color=yellow]Wario[/color] :mushroom: :shield: > [color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color] >**Rich (Passive)** - You are night immune, occupy and redirect immune. >**Vanish Cap (Day)** - Hide your visits tonight - 3 uses >**Flatulence (Day)** - Pass gass onto another player, poisoning them. The next night, they will poison everyone who visits them, and the following day, all poisoned targets will be notified. The poison will kill in 3 nights if not healed. - 2 uses >**Shoulderbash (Night)** - Kill target player bypassing heals - Infinite uses >**Doh I Missed (Night)** - Redirect a player to another player. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to kill the Infiltrators and the Minions to gain all the riches in the castle to yourself.*
> Credit to @Whammerist for the reworks for Wario and Waluigi.
[/details]
## Patchnotes: **1.0a** * Redirections will not say who the person was redirected to.
**1.1** * Many changes. Hammer Bro, Piranha Plant, Bob-omb and Paratroopa reworked * Occupation will now show feedback again * Added a new evil faction: The Conquerors consisting of Cackletta, Fawful and Midbus. (their converts are less powerful but they get more converts) * Lakitu, Thwomp and Magikoopa added. * Old Fawful renamed to Count Bleck. * Rosalina gets a force pardon abil * Trials removed, now it's when vote majority is reached, player is flipped and night starts. * Goomba immune to Flatulence and Kong no longer occ immune.
**1.1a** * Updated Cackletta passive.
**1.1b** * Updated Hammer Bro day abil to make it less of a 2 use scumfinding ability. * Bob-omb is now Killing
**1.1c** * Bob-omb is no longer unique * Cackletta gains Dark Star. * Conqueror Converts released
**1.2** * Occupy and visit prevention messages merged. * Some Infiltrator Converts released, I'm tired and also busy. * Occupation will always appear to work. * Piranha Plant's burn changed to day. * Midbus and Mario both get the exact same type of burn.
**1.3** * Infiltrator converts complete * Ability rewords to fit minimum feedback * Rosalina's force pardon removed for fakeclaimability
#### TODO: More Minions, Including Spike, Blooper and more More Infiltrators, **that ARE NOT TOADS fucking Miyamoto man, making all these Toad characters**
